name: ARSONIST (itch)
description:
Use your tools to burn down your opponents rounds after rounds!

Made for the Ludum Dare 42 Jam in 72h.
Theme: "Running out of space".

You can play the version 1.1 of the game. This version add music and mostly bug fixes. Made during the extra 24h of submission. You can still play the first version game if you want though (the name of the game used to be Paper Burn as I was very uninspired)

Credits:
- A game by Leonardo Montes
- Music and sound design by Romain Rope
